programme.desc: With Michael Jordans extraordinary fame came extraordinary scrutiny, and in 1993, it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls pursuit of a third straight title shadowed by question marks about Jordans gambling.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: As Michael Jordan pushes his teammates hard for a sixth NBA title, his intensity and hunger for basketball dominance is in stark contrast to his mindset in October 1993, when he stunned the world by walking away from the game.

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: Death Without Mercy (2024)
programme.desc: Documentary following two Syrian families over the course of ten days in the wake of the 7.8 magnitude earthquake in 2023 that left 50,000 people dead in Southern Turkey. Featuring CCTV footage from above ground, first-person footage from under the rubble, extensive vérité footage (some recorded on cell phones), drone footage, and news and archival footage, the tragedy is pieced together, uncovering the corruption, lies and government incompetence that exacerbated the disaster and its response.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: With Michael Jordan's extraordinary fame came extraordinary scrutiny, and in 1993, it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls' pursuit of a third straight title shadowed by question marks about Jordan's gambling.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: As Michael Jordan pushes his teammates hard for a sixth NBA title, his intensity and hunger for basketball dominance is in stark contrast to his mindset in October 1993, when he stunned the world by walking away from the game.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Michael Jordan would famously use even the smallest slight imaginable to motivate himself against an opponent. And when his NBA comeback in 1995 fell short in the playoffs, he worked harder than ever to return to form.

programme.title: The Last Dance
